original_text:
With much seductive speech she persuades him;
    with her smooth talk she compels him.
korean_text: 여러 가지 고운 말로 유혹하며 입술의 호리는 말로 꾀므로

sentences.original_text: With much seductive speech she persuades him
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 많은 꼬드기는 말로 그를 설득하고

sentences.original_text: with her smooth talk she compels him
